availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David A. Wheeler (Peoria County, Illinois, constable and laborer.)

body.p: Peoria County, Illinois, constable and laborer. Connecticut native. Married to Emily Miller Wheeler in Tuscarawas County, Ohio, on September 23, 1852. Father of Charles Wheeler, Frank Wheeler, Mary Wheeler, Harry Wheeler, Florence Wheeler, and Clement Wheeler. Constable in Peoria County, Illinois, in 1860. Laborer in Peoria County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Peoria County, Peoria Ward 2, pp. 151-2.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Peoria County, Peoria Ward 6, p. 425A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Peoria County, IL, June 1863, p. 375.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Tuscarawas County Marriages, Film 000317307.
